istream_iterator.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_ISTREAM_ITERATOR_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_ISTREAM_ITERATOR_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // istream_iterator.hpp
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 // note: this is a custom version of the standard istream_iterator.
00020 // This is necessary as the standard version doesn't work as expected
00021 // for wchar_t based streams on systems for which wchar_t not a true
00022 // type but rather a synonym for some integer type.
00023 
00024 #include <cstddef> // NULL
00025 #include <istream>
00026 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_facade.hpp>
00027 
00028 namespace boost { 
00029 namespace archive {
00030 namespace iterators {
00031 
00032 // given a type, make an input iterator based on a pointer to that type
00033 template<class Elem = char>
00034 class istream_iterator :  
00035     public boost::iterator_facade<
00036         istream_iterator<Elem>,
00037         Elem,
00038         std::input_iterator_tag,
00039         Elem
00040     >
00041 {
00042     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00043     typedef istream_iterator this_t ;
00044     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_facade<
00045         istream_iterator<Elem>,
00046         Elem,
00047         std::input_iterator_tag,
00048         Elem
00049     > super_t;
00050     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME std::basic_istream<Elem> istream_type;
00051  
00052     //Access the value referred to 
00053     Elem dereference() const {
00054         return m_current_value;
00055     }
00056 
00057     bool equal(const this_t & rhs) const {
00058         // note: only  works for comparison against end of stream
00059         return m_istream == rhs.m_istream;
00060     }
00061 
00062     void increment(){
00063         if(NULL != m_istream){
00064             m_current_value = m_istream->get();
00065             if(! m_istream->good()){
00066                 const_cast<this_t *>(this)->m_istream = NULL;
00067             }
00068         }
00069     }
00070 
00071     istream_type *m_istream;
00072     Elem m_current_value;
00073 public:
00074     istream_iterator(istream_type & is) :
00075         m_istream(& is)
00076     {
00077         increment();
00078     }
00079 
00080     istream_iterator() :
00081         m_istream(NULL)
00082     {}
00083 
00084     istream_iterator(const istream_iterator<Elem> & rhs) :
00085         m_istream(rhs.m_istream),
00086         m_current_value(rhs.m_current_value)
00087     {}
00088 
00089 };
00090 
00091 } // namespace iterators
00092 } // namespace archive
00093 } // namespace boost
00094 
00095 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_ISTREAM_ITERATOR_HPP
